item.title: Demand Change at CMU
item.description: Impact: Developing to Support Community Activism Key Concepts: Community Organizing, Information Transparency, Oversight, Accountability Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript Roles: Archivist, Web Developer, Community Activist Duration: Ongoing since June 2020 This project was born out of a particularly frustrating time to be a student at Carnegie Mellon University, made more difficult by the seemingly endless supply of outrage, energy, and effort that wasn’t being put towards a single, combined effort to effect change.
